name: ROOK
introduce:
Rook is an open settlement protocol that leverages the world’s best algorithmic strategists in order to maximize the value of every transaction for protocols, market makers, and traders alike. Rook is providing DeFi with a suite of Keeper-guarded, fully MEV-protected primitives to trade and borrow assets in a safer and more profitable way.
Rook’s mission is to provide the infrastructure to make DeFi more secure, egalitarian, and profitable for everyone involved.
